Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Chicago/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood, 75th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/63rd
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 63rd, Western, 59th & California, due to street blockage near California/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 63rd, Western, 59th, then resume their normal route on California, due to street blockage near California/63rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a stalled train near 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a stalled train near 95th/Eggleston.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 95th. Halsted. 87th, Lafayette, then resume their normal route on 95th.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 95th Terminal. State, 87th, Halsted, 95th, then resume their normal on 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a stalled train near 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a stalled train near 95th/Eggleston.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 95th. Halsted. 87th, Lafayette, 95th, then resume their normal route.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 95th Terminal. State, 87th, Halsted, 95th, then resume their normal route.


Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red & Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red & Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red & Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
